Example 7: Visual verification of generated assemblies by electron microscopy

To verify the shape of the purified VLPs, electron microscopy was performed. A 10 μΙ drop of VLP sample was incubated 10 min on a copper covered EM grid, stained with 5 μΙ phosphor tungsten acid for 5-10 min and de-stained 2 times with water for 1 min. The liquid on the grid was removed with a Whatman paper and the grid was transferred to the JEOL3000 microscope, investigated and pictures of the particles taken.
